name: Suspicious Execution from Outlook
description: Detects EnableUnsafeClientMailRules used for Script Execution from Outlook
query: (process.command_line:/.*[Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Uu][Nn][Ss][Aa][Ff][Ee][Cc][Ll][Ii][Ee][Nn][Tt][Mm][Aa][Ii][Ll][Rr][Uu][Ll][Ee][Ss].*/ OR (process.parent.executable:/.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:/.*\\\\\*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\\\*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*EnableUnsafeClientMailRules* OR (process.parent.executable:*\\outlook.exe AND process.command_line:*\\\\\* AND process.command_line:*\\\* AND process.command_line:*.exe*))`
